original_text: They replied, ‘Some people say that you are John the Baptist. Other people say that you are Elijah. And some other people say that you are one of God's prophets.’
korean_text: 제자들이 여짜와 이르되 세례 요한이라 하고 더러는 엘리야, 더러는 선지자 중의 하나라 하나이다

sentences.original_text: Some people say that you are John the Baptist
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 당신이 세례 요한이라고 말합니다

sentences.original_text: Other people say that you are Elijah
that you are one of God's prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 하나님의 예언자 중 한 분이라고
